languages.text: Старое и новое оружие с разных миров свалено в одну кучу, будто их перемешал ребенок. Свободные места засыпаны патронами разного калибра.
Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.
languages.original_text: Старое и новое оружие с разных миров свалено в одну кучу, будто их перемешал ребенок. Свободные места засыпаны патронами разного калибра.

traits.locale_text: Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.
Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.

Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.

languages.text: Armas tanto nuevas como anticuadas de distintos mundos se mezclan en un montón incoherente en el suelo, como si un niño las hubiera revuelto. Todo hueco entre ellas está lleno de munición de varios calibres.
languages.original_text: Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.

traits.locale_text: Armas tanto nuevas como anticuadas de distintos mundos se mezclan en un montón incoherente en el suelo, como si un niño las hubiera revuelto. Todo hueco entre ellas está lleno de munición de varios calibres.

languages.text: 来自各个世界的新旧武器杂乱无章地堆在一起，就像被孩童肆意弄乱一样，每个缺口都被填满了各种不同口径的弹药。
languages.original_text: Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.

traits.locale_text: 来自各个世界的新旧武器杂乱无章地堆在一起，就像被孩童肆意弄乱一样，每个缺口都被填满了各种不同口径的弹药。

languages.text: さまざまな惑星の新旧の武器がまるで子どもの手でまぜこぜにされたかのようにまとまりなく積み重なっている。さまざまな銃の口径の銃弾で隙間が満たされている。
languages.original_text: Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.

traits.locale_text: さまざまな惑星の新旧の武器がまるで子どもの手でまぜこぜにされたかのようにまとまりなく積み重なっている。さまざまな銃の口径の銃弾で隙間が満たされている。

languages.text: Alte und neue Waffen verschiedenster Welten bilden einen Haufen, als hätte sie ein Kind dort achtlos abgelegt. Jede Ritze ist mit Munition unterschiedlicher Kaliber gefüllt.
languages.original_text: Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.

traits.locale_text: Alte und neue Waffen verschiedenster Welten bilden einen Haufen, als hätte sie ein Kind dort achtlos abgelegt. Jede Ritze ist mit Munition unterschiedlicher Kaliber gefüllt.

languages.text: Des armes anciennes et récentes originaires de divers mondes sont entassées en un monceau hétéroclite, comme une pile de jouets brusquement dérangée par la main d'un enfant. Le moindre interstice est rempli de munitions de différents calibres.
languages.original_text: Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.

traits.locale_text: Des armes anciennes et récentes originaires de divers mondes sont entassées en un monceau hétéroclite, comme une pile de jouets brusquement dérangée par la main d'un enfant. Le moindre interstice est rempli de munitions de différents calibres.

languages.text: Çeşitli dünyalardan gelme eski ve yeni silahlar, bir çocuk tarafından sağa sola atılmış gibi tutarsızca yığılmış. Arada oluşan boşlukları ise farklı kalibrelerde mühimmat doldurmuş.
languages.original_text: Weapons both old and new from a variety of worlds lie together in an incoherent pile, as if jumbled by a child's hand. Every gap is filled with ammunition of different calibres.

traits.locale_text: Çeşitli dünyalardan gelme eski ve yeni silahlar, bir çocuk tarafından sağa sola atılmış gibi tutarsızca yığılmış. Arada oluşan boşlukları ise farklı kalibrelerde mühimmat doldurmuş.
